Container.Name: UniFi-Poller
Container.Overview: [b]Collect ALL UniFi Controller, Device and Client Data - Export to InfluxDB or Prometheus.[/b] Visualize with Grafana using included dashboards![br] [b]IMPORTAT! ACTION REQUIRED![/b] As of UniFi Poller version 2 all of the environment variables and config file format changed. You must reconfigure this container after you upgrade![br] [b]READ THE INSTRUCTIONS![/b] [u][a href="https://github.com/unifi-poller/unifi-poller/wiki/Configuration"]https://github.com/unifi-poller/unifi-poller/wiki/Configuration[/a][/u][br]

Config.Name: Poller Debug Mode
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_POLLER_DEBUG - Setting true includes more log output.

Config.Name: Poller Quiet Mode
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_POLLER_QUIET - Setting true disables most log output.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Host URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_URL - URL for UniFi controller.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Username
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_USER - Username for UniFi Controller.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Password
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_PASS - Password for UniFi Controller.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Save DPI
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SAVE_DPI - Poll and save deep packet inspection data. This is a lot of data, and it must be enabled on the controller.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Save IDS
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SAVE_IDS - Save intrusion detection data (InfluxDB only). This data does not contain graphable metrics.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Save Sites
Config.Description: Container Value: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SAVE_SITES - Set this to 'false' to save space and resources in InfluxDB. This data powers the Network Sites dashboard.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Poll Sites
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SITES_0 - List of sites to poll on controller, comma separated. Use cryptic ID values here; set to 'all' for all sites.

Config.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Verify SSL
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_VERIFY_SSL - Enable this if you have a valid SSL cert on your controller.

Config.Name: InfluxDB Host URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_URL - URL for InfluxDB. Not important if using Prometheus only.

Config.Name: InfluxDB Username
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_USER - Username for InfluxDB. Usually unimportant because InfluxDB has no auth by default.

Config.Name: InfluxDB Password
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_PASS - Password for InfluxDB (if required)

Config.Name: InfluxDB Database
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_DB - InfluxDB database name. Create this first with: CREATE DATABASE unifi

Config.Name: InfluxDB Interval
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_INTERVAL - Polling interval for saving metrics into InfluxDB. 30s-90s recommend.

Config.Name: InfluxDB Disabled
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_DISABLE - Disable InfluxDB polling. Set this true if you only use Prometheus.

Config.Name: Prometheus Listener
Config.Description: Container Value: UP_PROMETHEUS_HTTP_LISTEN - IP and port poller listens on for HTTP Prometheus scrapes. Must be in 0.0.0.0:port format.

Config.Name: Prometheus Disabled
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_PROMETHEUS_DISABLE - Disable Prometheus listener. Set true if you only use InfluxDB.
